name: Basic Driving Techniques
description: Learn all the basics of driving, including starting, steering, and stopping.

name: Intermediate Driving Course
description: Enhance your driving skills with our intermediate course, focusing on highway driving and parking.

name: Advanced Maneuvering
description: Master advanced driving maneuvers, including parallel parking and emergency braking.

name: Defensive Driving Techniques
description: Learn how to drive safely and defensively in various traffic conditions and environments.
